NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: The Inspired has completed its orbit around the star system, collecting as much of the deadly matter as it is safely able to.
2
1
CASSAVA: When I give the order, all deadly matter collected by the Inspired will be warped to its sibling warp core here.
3
2
CASSAVA: If everything goes as planned, the deadly matter should be completely contained by the deep oceans surrounding the Deep Storm Station, sealing it away indefinitely.
4
3
CASSAVA: I have ordered the Inspired to remain in stationary orbit around Giant's Deep. Should containment fail in my absence, the Inspired should catch any ghost matter that leaks out.
5 4
CASSAVA: And finally, I have released the surviving species within the Sanctuary to the surface of the planet with my voyager.
6 5
CASSAVA: My dearest hope.. is that these species will be able to live on to learn from the universe in our stead.
7 6
CASSAVA: I only wish.. I could see all the amazing discoveries they will surely make..
8 7
CASSAVA: ...I am ready.
9 8
CASSAVA: My friends.. Daz.. I cannot wait to join all of you.
10 9
CASSAVA: The universe is... And we shall become one with it!
DSS EX4 5
DSS EX5 2
DSS EX6 10
INSP R2 3
INSP R3 4
INSP EX4 4
